segments.text: I notice the warm light coming through the kitchen window onto the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes so meticulously, it's almost relaxing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the sink overflowing, water spilling out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not reacting at all, just keeps wiping that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing, and her foot's wetâ€”poor thing might slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my attention to the kids, the boy is up on the stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, and he's got a handful, sharing with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so excited, like little adventurers on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool doesn't look stable; it could all go wrong so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside view is serene, bushes and a path, totally contrasting the inside fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the mom turns around soon and sees their sneaky cookie grab.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the potential accident with the water and the climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the innocence of the kids makes me smile a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of little joys hidden in the everyday hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
